titleStmt.title: Two briefe treatises The one containing matter of perswasion and expostulation concerning catechisme with certaine positions of like consideration. The other, touching peace betweene the minister and his people: as likewise the lawfulnesse, and dutie of the ministers presenting (if need require) outward disobedience vnto his ministerie.
titleStmt.author: C. P., fl. 1616.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Stansby for William Butler, and are to be sold at his shop in S. Dunstanes Church-yard in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shop in S. Dunstanes Church-yard in Fleetstreet
